p:
The kernel function is defined as Eq. 7. The parameters of Eq. ( 7) are x i and x j is the samples and γ is the kernel parameter.
7
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$K\left( {x_{i} ,x_{j} } \right) = \exp \left( { - \gamma \left\| {x_{i} - x_{j} } \right\|^{2} } \right).$$\end{document}
